header.tagline: Head AI Engineer â€“ AI Solutions & Innovation

summary: AI leader with over 5 years of experience in tech innovation, achieving a 70% increase in sales and driving pioneering solutions across SaaS and fintech.

bullets.text: Led comprehensive AI initiatives to push technological boundaries, cultivating a culture of relentless innovation, resulting in significant increases in market competitiveness and a 20% increase in project efficiency.
Spearheaded the development of leading-edge AI solutions, enhancing company product offerings and expanding market penetration by 45% within the first 6 months.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish and refine AI strategy, successfully integrating AI-backed features into existing products, which resulted in a 32% increase in customer engagement.
Redefined legal research in Uruguay with a Gen AI product, streamlining process duration from days to mere minutes, achieving a transformative impact for legal professionals.
Developed an innovative online insurance tool that eliminated the need for medical exams, effectively reducing user onboarding time by 70% and simplifying customer acquisition.
Integrated advanced technologies to optimize the user interface and streamline the insurance documentation process, reducing administrative overhead by 42%.
Designed a dual-platform interface allowing users to access tailored insurance plans seamlessly via web and mobile, leading to a 30% increase in mobile user engagement.
Delivered high-quality user experiences by developing full-stack web and mobile applications with modern frameworks, ensuring compatibility and performance across devices.
Played a key role in designing engaging user interfaces, translating client requirements into intuitive front-end solutions, which improved user satisfaction by 28%.
Facilitated pivotal client decision-making, aligning outcomes with project vision and objectives, which resulted in a 95% client satisfaction rating.
Published multiple high-performing applications to App Store and Google Play, enhancing both availability and performance, ultimately increasing downloads by 65%.

projects.name: UruguAi Legal

details: Transformed traditional research methods, reducing task durations from days to minutes.
Pioneered AI-driven legal search platform with a custom chat interface similar to GPT.

details: Increased law firm sales by 70% in just two months.
Saved hundreds of hours in administrative tasks, optimizing workforce allocation.
